text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , b [ 205 ] , i , j , test = 0 , n = 0 ; long int ans ; for ( i = 0 ; i < 205 ; i ++ ) b [ i ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test != 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n != 0 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } if ( a [ i ] [ 0 ] > a [ i ] [ 1 ] ) b [ i ] = a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; else b [ i ] = a [ i ] [ 1 ] ; ans += b [ i ] ; n -- ; } printf ( "%ld" , ans ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } } return 0 ; }
